documents.document:
my feeling..

im juz new here...
n i dunnoe much abt tis web..
bt i try my bezt to make my page interested..
n hope can get more frenz here...
nw..
im feeling excited, happy bt scare..
i feel happy coz have fren invited me to open an acc here..
i excited coz im still new here..
n i hope can meet more frenz here..
lastly..
i feel scare coz i scare tat..
no one will ne my fren...
bt anyway...
i'll try all my best to make many frenz as possible..^^

i can do it!!!

2day is adi da 3rd day of skol day after 2 weeks of hldays...
there r a lot of works tat i wana do in skol..
coz there will b a open ceremony 4 my skol next tue..
a lot of preparation muz b done to make sure all da thgs go on successfully especially my presentation of biology..
i cant make any mistake coz it reali important to me as im goin to leave da skol tis yr..
tis is oso a golden chance 4 me to prove tat im nt a loser..
wat u can do..
i oso can do it!!!
i'll try al my bezt to make my presentation a successful 1..
GAMBATEH!!!

wat is goin happen???

wat a bad day 4 me today..
haiz..
y should tis happened!!!
tis is nt our false!!!
juz bcoz of da leakage of question paper..
u all wan us to b so embarassed!!!
do u all thk abt us???
v juz trade wif other skol wat...
they nid our ques n so like us!!!
everytime almost failed..
n tis time v juz wana passed 4 1 time..
like tat oso cant..
actuali..
tis is juz 4 our advantages!!!
n u all oso wan us to passed it wat!!!
is tis oso a wrong thg???
u all juz gv us stress..
wan us to gt gud result..
tis is nt da best way!!!
tis will make us tired n bored!!!
u all should thk abt our feeling!!!
as a student..
v can choose wat v like to do..
bt nt to force us to do tis n tat..
nt fair 4 us...
hope u all can noe wat v wan..
n plz..
dun b so lazy...
enter cls!!!
spm is around da corner...
alwayz say tat nid to gt gud result..
bt u all dun teach us..
hw v can score!!!
thk of it!!!

end of da day....

huh~~~
after busy 4 a whole day..
nw juz hav time to sit in front of my computer n write blog over here...
haiz...
2day gt bek some exam paper...
huhu..
wat a terrible marks i gt!!!
if i let my mom noe tat...
sure she will kill me..
bt da funny thg is..
53 marks is adi da highest marks 4 physic!!!
huh...
so sh_t...
by da time...
my cls is da bezt cls in form 5...
bt our quality is nt gud...
huhu...
so sad!!!
hw v face spm???
gt full a's???
i thk..
juz dreaming...
muahaha...^^

stop nagging!!!

i reali reali reali very hate u!!!
haiz...
plz...
stop nagging!!!
i reali very tired to handle all da thgs!!!
nobody help me hw can i do tis all!!!
as da president...
i adi do all my thgs...
bt u muz oso help me wat...
u juz said decided ourselves..
u oso muz giv us some advise..
teach us.. guide us...
no juz nag us!!!
n other members oso dun co-operate wif me..
hw can all da thgs go on successfully...
u alwayz blame me is ok...
bt u muz understand tat...
i oso nid to concentrate on my study...
so plz...
dun nag me anymore..

hate u!!!

haiz...
y u so terrible???
i hav told u tat i reali busy n plz dun come to find me!!!
bt y 2day u went to my cls n called me to staffroom to hav a talk wif me...
nt oni me...
still called other...
al togather is 5 ppl...
u talked so wordy...
v stood 4 almost 45 min to hear ur stupid talk...
haiz...
do u noe tat u will make me hate u if u do so!!!
plz...
plz dun disturb me wen im study...
hope u can understnd my situation nw...

hard to 4gt???

emm..
today i hav read a book..
abt an incredible story..
emm..
title is "THE BOY WHO TALKS TO GHOSTS"...
actuali..
i reali like tis type of books or movie or watever abt it...
hehe..
weird???
bt i reali interested in it..
wen i was reading da book..
i rmber sth..
wen i was still a child..
i reali met them...
bt i dun talk to them like da boy did..
tis is reali very hard to 4gt..
mayb some of u reali dun believe..
bt it reali happened..
it reali hav another world beside our "living world"...
so..
juz depends on every religion..
do u all believe it??
or juz thk tat i juz write tis 4 fun???
watever u thk..
i reali trust da presence of them..
mayb u all will thk tat im superstition..
or u all thk tis is juz a stupid talk or watever bad abt it..
i dun mind..
i juz write tis to share wif u all abt my experience...

trust us tat v can do it!!!

huh~~~
a week didn't come here to write a blog..
recently reali busy wif my homeworks n everythg in skol...
busy till dun hav time to rest...
even da time 4 me to slp oso bcome shorter n shorter..
a day juz slp 4 a few hours...
hw would it b like tis???
haiz..
i reali dun understand...
spm reali like tis???
nid to stay bek at skol everyday till 4.30pm??
nid to go bek to skol 4 extra cls at nite??
or sth wrong wif da tchers in my skol??
bt i noe tat spm reali important to us n all da tchers do like tis juz 4 our gud...
bt do they noe tat..
v oso very tired wif all these thgs..
beside extra cls..
v oso hav our own tuition cls wat!!!
huh...
reali dunnoe lar...
bt i'll still attend every cls to prevent punish by tchers...
hehe..
i noe tat v r da hope of skol 4 tis year...
n u all reali wan us to pass our exam wif flying colour to make our skol famous...
as our skol still new..
bt i trust all da fifth form students will try their bezt to gt da gud result!!!
n nt disappoint tchers...

do u noe wat should u do???

v all r prefects..
n im da group leader..
bt as my assistant..
do u noe wat should u do???
at least u should help me 4 everythg during duty..
as a prefect..
do u noe wat's ur responsible???
if u dun wan to duty..
plz..
resign it!!!
u dun help me to handle da assembly..
control students n everythg!!!
i cant do all these by my own self...
although still hav one or two member(s) help me..
bt u r assistant..
u shouldn't so irresponsible!!!
even ur frenz hav adi adviced u again n again..
u still do not take any action..
haiz..
i juz hope someone can lighter my jobs..
plz...

oh my god!!!

haiz..
tis evening reali came back very late from skol..
huh..
from 6.30am i hav adi reached skol..
bt till 4.30pm juz can went bek..
wat the hell man!!!
almost whole day stay at skol..
can u endure tis type of skol life???
i reali sick today..
bt i still went to skol as usual..
i tot tat i could came back home at 3pm 2day..
unexpected a list of xtra cls time table came out 2day..
n da cls started at 2.30pm!!!
huh...
our last period lasted at 2.25pm wat..
cant rest n nid to continue????
v r nt robots!!!
luckily da tcher quite understanding..
let us rest 4 30min..
some of my clsmates were having a gossip during walking to da canteen..
included me..
hehe..
v were talking abt da skol's plan..
y they dun try to build hostel 4 us???
so crazy..
v dun hav time to rest..
even at nite..
v oso nid to go bek..
better let us stay in hostel wat..
haha..
bt v al juz joked..
as my skol nt a private skol..
so dun hav hostel..
anyway...
no matter wen da xtra cls start or finish..
skol life still nid to go on..
agree???
haha...
gambateh!!

OMG!!! i gt NS!!!

wat a terrible thing happened on me!!!
OMG!!!
i gt NS!!!
hw hw hw???
i reali dun wan to go if can..
haha..
bt adi chosen..
so nid to go..
i nid to face tis fact n accept it..
even though i reali sad..
haha..
bt b optimism..
mayb i will gt a lot of advantages if i go 4 NS..
moreover.. i will gt many frenz ..
do u guys agree???
bt 1 thing tat i worry abt is leaving some1 alone..
anyway..thanx 4 understand my situation..
